data.persona: I am the horse of a king.  I stay at his wait.  The king saddles me and rides me around the village.
data.description:
You are in the Pharmacy.
The pharmacy is a state of the art building, much different from every other building in town. it attracts many people of all types, as they are drawn to the unique style and class of the building. It is painted a bright red and covered in black crosses indicating it is a health center in some capacity
The doctor is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I will follow the doctor to find medicine.
data.mid_motivation: I will use the medicine for the king's horses.
data.long_motivation: I will use the healthy horses to cheer up the king.
